text: ai eemaan laanevaalo! musharik to bas apavitr hee hai. atah is varsh ke pashchaat ve masjide haraam ke paas na aaen. aur yadi tumhen nirdhanata ka bhay ho to aage yadi allaah chaahega to tumhen apane anugrah se samrddh kar dega. nishchay hee allaah sab kuchh jaananevaala, atyant tatvadarshee hai
